Detailed Description

This class is used to instantiate the corresponding Widget object from the content of a layout XML file.

The LayoutInflater class is used to instantiate the corresponding Widget object from the content of a layout XML file.

For performance reasons, the XML files are pre-processing that is done at build time.

Therefore, it only works with an unique resource ID from the resource system(R.something file.)

The following example demonstrates how to use the LayoutInflater 

 MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstanceState) {
 //instantiate the Scene to manage visual interface
 Scene* mpScene = Scene::SceneFactory(this);
 Context* mpContext = new Context(this);

 //instantiate the LayoutInflater
 LayoutInflater* mpInflater = new LayoutInflater(mpContext);

 //using a unique resource ID to instantiate Widget object
 LinearController* linear = dynamic_cast<LinearController*>(mpInflater->inflate(MyPage::R::layout::main));

 mpScene->attachController(linear);
 mpScene->setupSceneLayout();
 }

gaia::core::LayoutInflater::LayoutInflater ( gaia::core::Context *  context) [explicit]

The constructor of the LayoutInflater.

Parameters:
[in]contextThe Context in which this LayoutInflater will create its Widgets; most importantly, this supplies the theme from which the default values for their attributes are retrieved.

Member Function Documentation

gaia::core::Widget* gaia::core::LayoutInflater::inflate ( int32_t  resource,
gaia::core::WidgetController *  root = NULL,
bool  attachToRoot = true 
)

Inflate a new Widget hierarchy from the specified xml resource.

Parameters:
[in]resourceID for an XML layout resource to load (e.g., R::layout::main).
[in]rootOptional Widget to be the parent of the generated hierarchy (if attachToRoot is true), or else simply an object that provides a set of ControllerParams values for root of the returned hierarchy (if attachToRoot is false.)
[in]attachToRootWhether the inflated hierarchy should be attached to the root parameter? If false, root is only used to create the correct subclass of ControllerParams for the root Widget in the XML.
